title: A posteriori environment analysis with Pushdown Delta CFA.
abstract: Flow-driven higher-order inlining is blocked by free variables, yet current theories of environment analysis cannot reliably cope with multiply-bound variables. One of these, I  CFA , is a promising theory based on stack change but is undermined by its finite-state model of the stack. We present Pushdown I  CFA  which takes a I  CFA -approach to pushdown models of control flow and can cope with multiply-bound variables, even in the face of recursion.
